allow photos.=
 But, you can post them someplace like Photobucket and then attach 
a link =
to your folder here. I haven't done that myself for almost a year, so 
you'=
ll have to brush up on posting photos on Photobucket; its free and easy to =

do. 
=C2=A0
Ron STL
